name: Add rows in Google Sheets spreadsheet for new event people in Swapcard
description:
Every time an event person is added to your Swapcard, Make will add it as a row to your Google Sheets.
For the scenario to work we expect you to make sure your sheet has same columns as this (example)[https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Wn4Z3jxJu-rSO89F9T5yY0XRKOzmHzJ6bS5RpkGGWF0/edit?usp=sharing].
